Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31144 affecting package redis for versions less than 6.2.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-31144 affecting package redis for versions less than 6.2.9-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package redis is earlier than 6.2.9-1, affected by CVE-2022-31144
